DDescription.description: Checks if the given file exists. If it exists the "next" connector is used, if it does not exist then the "error" connnector is used. The pipelet does not distinguish between a file and a directory.
Can be used as an alternative to FileName. Only one of File and FileName is used. File takes precedence.
Can be used as an alternative to File. Only one of File and FileName is used. File takes precedence.
Can be used as an alternative to DirectoryName. Only one of Directory and DirectoryName is used. Directory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with File or FileName.
Can be used as an alternative to Directory. Only one of Directory and DirectoryName is used. Directory takes precedence. Used in conjunction with File or FileName.
